original_title: Bullet Reloaded: Triumph TR7 & TR8 In Detail
overview: This DVD answers many questions about the TR7/8 from the Speke factory to the problems the Abingdon Woprks team faced with a new Rally car. Goes further to the North American racing scene which featured the very successful TR8 IMSA GTO Racers.
title: Bullet Reloaded: Triumph TR7 & TR8 In Detail
